meanings.definition: A decorative design or pattern set into a surface.
meanings.sent1: The intricate inlays on the wooden table added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry box had beautiful inlays of mother of pearl.
meanings.sent3: The inlays on the cake were so pretty that everyone thought they were edible gems.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an inlay of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The artist's inlays of gold leaf shimmered in the light, mesmerizing all who saw them.

meanings.definition: To set pieces of material into a surface to form a design.
meanings.sent1: She carefully inlays the mosaic tiles into the tabletop.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman inlays the precious stones into the silver pendant.
meanings.sent3: He inlays the puzzle pieces into the board, creating a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The chef inlays the chocolate shavings on top of the cake like a master artist.
meanings.sent5: The gardener inlays the colorful pebbles along the garden path, creating a beautiful mosaic.

meanings.definition: Pieces of material set into a surface to form a design.
meanings.sent1: The antique dresser had intricate wooden inlays along its edges.
meanings.sent2: The guitar's inlays of abalone shell made it a work of art.
meanings.sent3: The inlays of glass on the vase sparkled like tiny diamonds.
meanings.sent4: The inlays of silver on the belt buckle caught the light beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The inlays of colored tiles on the floor formed a stunning geometric pattern.
